title: Lyte brings in $107M to build perception systems for AI-enabled robots
description:
Lyte AI said it engineered its platform, LyteVision, for safety, reliability, and performance from the hardware up.

The post Lyte brings in $107M to build perception systems for AI-enabled robots appeared first on The Robot Report.
